author: zhen
msg: Changing the targetOrigin parameter of window.postMessage calls from "*" to target window's domain.
This security patch prevents cross-domain message sniffing attacks.
Tested in FF3, Safari nightly, and Opera9 which have implemented the HTML5-compliant postMessage API.
